title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Full-stack portfolio showcasing my projects and skills. Built with Next.js (React/TypeScript) for the frontend and Node.js/Express/MongoDB for the backend API. Features dynamic project loading, Formspree contact integration, and responsive design with Tailwind CSS.
